column4: Arvin ... I set up a server ,and see it on the intra net ,but when I do a port forward port 80 I loose all connection from the intranet to the cloud and end up resetting the modem
Just a index site ,and my first time trying .. phoned the service provider they said they dont do support on web hosting ...and also not on linux
Did start port 80 end port 80 .. one for in one separate for out .. dont know bout DMZ ?
